thread.section_title: Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Anniversary Stay
thread.title_full: Anniversary Stay - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Brandon W
title: Anniversary Stay
text: We just completed a long weekend stay for our anniversary at The Library Hotel. It has everything you need in NYC. The staff welcomes you and remembers you by name. The complimentary breakfast, cookies, cheese and wine is an amazing touch. The staff there is extremely friendly as well. The roof top bar is the icing on the cake. It's the perfect place for a nightcap.
